data.name: Monster Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
《Monster Dungeon》is a pixel Roguelike game, You can collect resources or materials in the game to craft equipment,tools,items, or enter the monster dungeon to challenge powerful monsters.

Features



  • Randomly Generated Dungeons - Experience a new dungeon each time you play.

  • You can chop trees, mine ores, harvest plants, Use the resources and materials you collect to craft equipment,tools,items.

  • You can use the souls to upgrade your equipment.

  • You can challenge epic giant monsters in the dungeon.

  • Permanent Death, But your equipment will not disappear. This can reduce your frustration.

  • Multiplayer game (to be determined), Adventure with your buddies.

  • There are many interesting settings waiting for you to discover!

data.short_description: 《Monster Dungeon》is a pixel Roguelike game, You can collect resources or materials in the game to craft equipment,tools,items, or enter the monster dungeon to challenge powerful monsters.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, German, Russian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel core i3, 1.5 GHz and up
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mountain Lion 10.6.x
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux Distribution
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
